pr_title: Remove stacktrace from RestException and StreamException

timeline.message:
Allow RestRestliServer and StreamRestliServer throw RestException and StreamException with no stacktrace

RestException and StreamException are nested exceptions wrapped around low level throwable, usually a restliServerException.
Remove stack trace for outter nested exception can save time and reduce logging effort on server side.

timeline.bodyText: Can we make this backward compatible change by introducing an overloaded method?
timeline.author: nizarm

timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't the cause.toString() end up printing the entire stack trace? You probably just want to include the exception message for 'message' parameter (cause.getMessage())
timeline.author: nizarm

replies.author: xuli-in

replies.bodyText: For RestLiServiceException, the toString is overritten and not include stacktrace.
replies.author: xuli-in

timeline.message: Merge branch 'stacktracelessServer' of https://github.com/xuli-in/rest.li into stacktracelessServer
